title: John Stamos Charged with DUI
text:
John Stamos Charged with DUI Posted just a moment ago 
ABC/Randy Holmes (LOS ANGELES) -- John Stamos has been charged with DUI in Los Angeles County in connection with an arrest last June. 
The Grandfathered actor, 52, is scheduled to be arraigned Friday. 
Stamos was arrested June 12 in Beverly Hills on suspicion of driving under the influence, and was hospitalized for an unknown medical condition. Weeks later, he entered rehab for substance abuse. 
Stamos is charged with one misdemeanor count of driving a vehicle while under the influence of a drug. The drug he allegedly used is not stated in the complaint. 
The actor faces six months in jail if convicted. 
Stamos stars in the new Fox comedy Grandfathered and is working on a Full House update for Netflix.
